title: Why do singles come out around the same time as albums do, and why aren’t those singles just in the albums? - Quora

response.answer_text: In the past, this has been because the singles drove album sales. However, now singles are being released well in advance of album availability. Garth Brooks just released a single for an album that won’t be released until next year some time. The single brings in revenue now instead of a year from now. It keeps the artist in the public mind. By the time an album is released, 3 or 4 songs may have hit the charts and made the album profitable before its release.
Singles are used as a promotional tool to get you to buy the album.
